thread.title: How to Wear Layers Without Looking Bulky
thread.title_full: How to Wear Layers Without Looking Bulky

author: cflammia
title: How to Wear Layers Without Looking Bulky
text:
How to Wear Layers Without Looking Bulky Marshmallow isn’t exactly the most stylish shape you can be By Christine Flammia January 27, 2017 Ollie Millington 
Ghostbusters ’ Stay Puft Marshmallow man. The Michelin Man. The Pillsbury Doughboy. These guys might make great headrests, but their puffy silhouettes are far from aspirational. During winter, you want to feel as warm as they do—but maybe with a slimmer shape. 
Instead of throwing on your entire wardrobe when it’s cold, be strategic in your layers. Here, 10 fashion bloggers illustrate how to style your outfit so you’ll stay warm—without looking puffy. Here’s what to do.
